settings.title: LED Strip Retrofit Kits
settings.content: The fastest way to upgrade from fluorescent tubes. Whether you are looking for ease-of-application with magnetic options, Buy American Act compliancy, or simply an energy efficient alternative to your current lighting, LED strip lights will save time, meet your needs, and live up to the highest standards.

settings.html:
Color & Wattage Selectable LED Strip Retrofit Kits

Upgrade your fluorescent fixtures to 2700K, 3000K, 3500K, 4000K, or 5000K high-efficiency LED lighting. These versatile kits offer 15 lighting combinations in one and are an easy-install, energy efficient alternative to fluorescent & older LED tubes. For grated or exposed troffers, lens covers are available for each kit as well. Upgrade your lighting today for efficiency, longevity, and improved light quality.

The fastest way to upgrade from fluorescent tubes. These magnetic retrofit kits for fluorescent troffers are an easy-install, energy efficient alternative to fluorescent or even older LED tubes. Upgrade your lighting for efficiency, longevity, and improved light quality today.

Browse All LED Strip Retrofit Kits

Professional-grade LED retrofit kits for your fluorescent lights. Quickly & easily upgrade your office building, retail store, warehouse, hospital, factory, and more. A number of our kits are Buy American Act Compliant, produced right here in Hatboro, Pennsylvania. The Buy-American retrofit kits offer incredible efficiencies up to 188 lumens/Watt. Just look for the USA flag on the product image!

Wattage & CCT Selectable Kits for the Best Fluorescent-to-LED Conversions

These kits cover an enormous range of needs, and can be all you need to convert all the linear fluorescent lighting across your property to LED. These lights can work with standard or high ceilings, 2x2, 2x4, 1x4, 1x8, 2x8, or even cove lighting. Adjust the wattage setting to suit your ceiling height and light output needs; adjust the color temperature settings to get the best light hue for every space.

Our LED retrofit experts are ready to assist. Reach out today to convert your fluorescent lights to LED.

Call 215.355.7200 or Text 267.266.8330

Frequently Asked Questions about Magnetic LED Light Strips

1. Can LED strip lights replace fluorescent tubes?

Absolutely! LED strip lights are a versatile lighting solution that can effectively replace traditional fluorescent tubes. Our retrofit kits are designed precisely for this purpose, offering a hassle-free way to transition from fluorescent to LED technology.

2. What are the best LED strips to get?

When it comes to choosing the best LED strips, it's essential to consider factors like brightness, color temperature, and quality. Our Magnetic LED Strip Lights are crafted with superior materials, ensuring longevity and optimal performance. Explore our range to find the perfect fit for your lighting needs.

3. Are LED strips good for lighting a room?

LED strip lights are not only suitable but also highly efficient for illuminating rooms. With their flexibility, you can install them along ceilings, walls, or under cabinets to create ambient and accent lighting, transforming the ambiance of any space.

4. How to replace the tubes and ballast in a fluorescent light fixture with LED strips?

Switching from fluorescent tubes to magnetic LED strips is easier than you might think. Our Fluorescent-to-LED Retrofit Kits come with comprehensive instructions, guiding you through the process step by step. Say goodbye to ballasts and complex wiring—our kits offer a direct and simplified approach to upgrade your lighting.

5. Do I need to bypass existing ballasts? If so, how do I bypass a ballast?

Yes, for LED retrofit kits, you need to bypass the ballast. Bypassing the ballast is a straightforward process:

  1. Turn off the power to the fixture.
  2. Disconnect the input power from the ballast.
  3. Remove the wires connecting the ballast to the tombstones (sockets).

You can choose to leave the ballast in the fixture or remove it entirely, depending on your preference.

6. What fixture types can Magnetic LED Strip Lights be used with?

Magnetic LED Strip Lights are highly versatile and can be used with various fixture types. They are compatible with linear lighting fixtures, troffers, and other similar configurations. Their magnetic design ensures a secure and convenient installation process, while also making them versatile for unique applications!

Benefits of Using LED Magnetic Strip Retrofit Kits:

  • Energy Efficiency: LED technology is renowned for its energy-saving capabilities. Our retrofit kits allow you to drastically reduce energy consumption, leading to lower electricity bills and a more environmentally friendly lighting solution.
  • Longevity: LED strip lights have an impressively long lifespan compared to fluorescent tubes. With our Magnetic LED Strip Lights, you can enjoy consistent and reliable illumination for years to come, minimizing the need for frequent replacements.
  • Customization: Our LED strips offer versatile lighting possibilities. Whether you're aiming for warm, cozy lighting or bright, invigorating illumination, our kits allow you to choose the ambiance according to the needs of the space. Also, if you need custom lengths, we can provide aspecial-order kit made to your specifications since we manufacture LED strip lights in-house.
  • Easy Installation: Installing our retrofit kits is a breeze. The magnetic design simplifies the process, ensuring a secure and hassle-free attachment to your troffers without the need for intricate tools or skills.

At ELEDLights, we're committed to providing you with top-notch solutions to enhance your lighting experience. Reach out to us with any inquiries or concerns you may have about transitioning to LED lighting at the contact info at the bottom of this page.

settings.html:
LED Strips for YOUR Lighting Upgrade

Strip kits are the fastest and easiest fluorescent troffer upgrades on the market. It doesn't matter what kind of ballast your troffer has, how many tubes it holds, or what size it is; our kits provide a complete and simple retrofit solution to get those troffers running energy-efficient, long-life, state-of-the-art LED technology. LED strips attach to any linear lighting fixtures and eliminate the need for ballasts—which means there’s no need to wire power to tombstones. If you have any questions about upgrading your fluorescent lights to LED, get in touch!
